ModMetaData.name: [1001]Pewpew
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to expand immersion of the player using high-quality, realistic sounds. It goes through and replaces every ranged weapon's sound file with a detailed, nuanced, *pristine*...
It makes the guns go "pew pew"
...
You may ask: "Why?" I don't have an answer, except that it needed to exist.
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at:
\n\nCredit to KinghtHasen of Fallout 4 Pew Lasers fame. His mod is truly a masterpiece: https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/5143?tab=description \n\nVersion 1.0.0 \nFor version 1.3.
